comments: He e is an awesome person but he is never at his office, lately.

I\'m glad he can be rate here! He is the most positive person I ever meet. He is very helpfull, and a gently spirit. He loves other cultures and just a simple convertation with him will teach you a lot!

Professor Silvers is a wonderful person, and advisor. But I think he must be more time at his office, because he is great with students. Some times he doesn\'t return calls for appointments; so left students few options more to choose a good counselor. Cuny must hire more advisors like him, and drop all the bunch of lazy-ones!
Ask him about scholarships and grants! He is a genius! Awesome, polite, helpful, and the best!
Awesome + very inteligent, kind + respectful @ every culture + has a pleasent convertation. Very helpful + very decent. Hostos must be proud 4 having a professor li ke him.
